name: Angelo Skate Away
description: Angelo Skate Away is a brand new game based on the successful TV show Angelo Rules!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual Core 6600 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4400, GeForce GTX 280, AMD Radeon HD 7750 Storage: 510 MB available space Additional Notes: Internet connection required to tweet from the game
